Name: Fu Manchu Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
7.5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
22.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A Natural Daiquiri with a refreshing, clean, citrusy, minty edge.
History: Adapted from a recipe in David A. Embury's 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Fu Manchu Daiquiri contains 215 calories
